list.abs: ...“国际语”的创立人。基于综合、、和的词汇以及大大简化，他试图使这种语言成为一种国际辅助语言。编纂了《国际语词汇》（Vocabulario de interlingua），并曾任国际语学院院长。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from inter- 'between' + Latin lingua 'tongue'

means.word_mean: 1. an artificial language proposed for use as an auxiliary international language; based on words common to English and the Romance languages
